story:
Once upon a time, in the beautiful land of Mali, there was a small village nestled between the rolling hills and the shimmering river. The villagers were simple, hardworking people who lived in harmony with the land and all its creatures.

In this village, there was a young girl named Amina. Amina was a curious and kind-hearted child, always full of energy and wonder. She loved to explore the hills and wade in the river, discovering new things and making friends with the animals that lived there.

One day, while playing by the river, Amina noticed a small, struggling fish trapped in a shallow pool. The pool had dried up, and the fish was unable to swim back to the river. Amina knew she had to help.

She carefully scooped up the fish in her hands and carried it back to the river. As she released the fish into the water, it gave her a grateful look and swam away. From that day on, Amina and the fish became the best of friends.

Every day, Amina would visit the river to play with her fish friend. They would swim together, chase each other, and even sing to each other. Amina was happier than she had ever been.

But then, one day, the fish disappeared. Amina searched the river for her friend, but it was nowhere to be found. She was heartbroken.

Days turned into weeks, and weeks into months. Amina continued to visit the river every day, but she never saw her fish friend again. She missed it dearly, but she knew that sometimes friends have to part ways.

One day, as Amina was sitting by the river, she noticed something glistening in the sun. She reached down and picked it up, and to her surprise, it was a beautiful, shimmering scale. Amina recognized it immediately â€“ it was from her fish friend!

She looked around, and there, in the distance, she saw the most amazing sight. It was her fish friend, bigger and more beautiful than ever before, swimming in a school of fish, all shimmering and glistening in the sun.

Amina knew that her fish friend had grown and was now living a happy life with its own kind. She was filled with joy and gratitude for the time they had spent together.

From that day on, Amina knew that even though friends may have to part ways, the memories and love they share will last forever.

And with that thought, Amina closed her eyes and drifted off to sleep, dreaming of her fish friend and all the adventures they had shared.

The end.

May this story of friendship and love fill your heart with warmth and peace, my dear daughter. Goodnight and sweet dreams.
